Articles.Content:
The first satellite to carry a living organism(A squid put in the stayputnik capsule)

![fb3cuPt.png](http://i.imgur.com/fb3cuPt.png)

Sentinel 3 experiencing an eclipse during orbital tuning

Can you actually do that in-game?

> 
> Can you actually do that in-game?

No, sadly. I just imagine a squid floating in a empty stayputnik

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T07:50:13Z" title="08/09/2015 07:50  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Voyager275**
Oh. More Kalamari for the Kerbals then.
